content: pattern repeat 8 stitches & 4 row main lace pattern circumference start working the chart or written instruction for 10 11 12 pattern repeats around meaning one chart between each of the markers 10/11/12 x 8 = 80/88/96 sts length work through pattern approximately 11 times or until desired length pattern repeat -written instructions row 1 k2 p1 yo k2tog tbl p1 k2 row 2 k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 row 3 k2 p1 k2tog yo p1 k2 row 4 k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 finish garter edging round 1 purl round 2 knit round 3 purl rnds 4-7 repeat rnds 2 & 3 two more times removing markers in your last round bind off in your favorite stretchy method finishing cut yarn leaving an 8 /20cm tail thread onto a tapestry needle and weave in loose ends wet or dry block enjoy ©corrine lung 2024 pattern for personal use only easy as air cowl 3 by corrine lung 2024 you may also like the following patterns healy pass cowl moraine lake cable hat my martini beanie available in my ravelry store https //www ravelry com/designers/corrine-lung this pattern is ©corrine lung 2024 of corrine lung designs please share your work with the hashtag #easyasaircowland #corrinelungdesignsto share the handmade love ravelry lungc instagram @corrinelungdesigns facebook corrine lung designs email corrinelungdesigns@gmail com ©corrine lung 2024 pattern for personal use only easy as air cowl 4 by corrine lung 2024
